name: BLUBELLE
desc:
Introducing an exquisite residential marvel, the 32-storied skyscrapers of Purva BLUBELLE span across 3.85 acres of land. These thoughtfully designed 3-BHK apartments offer residents a serene living experience, with an expansive 80% open space and an impressive array of 50+ luxurious amenities. Immerse yourself in the beauty of 17 meticulously landscaped gardens, indulge in 22 natural outdoor experiences, and enjoy 11 outdoor sports options. The project also features an exclusive 8,000 sqft standalone clubhouse offering 10+ indoor amenities for residents to enjoy.





One of the standout features of Purva BLUBELLE is its prime location on Magadi Road, one of Bengaluru's fastest-growing areas. This strategic positioning provides easy connectivity to the Magadi Road metro station, ensuring convenient transportation options for residents. Additionally, the location offers access to a range of amenities, including renowned super-specialty hospitals, top educational institutions, the thriving IT industry, shopping malls, hotels, and much more.





Experience the epitome of refined living at Purva BLUBELLE, where luxurious comforts, natural beauty, and a prime location come together to create an unparalleled residential experience.

name: Sobha Rajvilas
desc:
Sobha Limited is bringing up a new housing project named Rajvilas in Rajaji Nagar, Bangalore. Located beside Chord Road and Manjunath Nagar Flyover, the area is located in one of the central areas of the city. The Bengaluru Railway Station is just 2.9 km away from the area and the nearest metro station is Rajajinagar metro station on Green Line running between Yelachenahalli and Nagasandra, which is also only 1 km away from the residential complex.

The location of the society is also favourable in terms of a wide range of facilities available in the neighborhood, such as schools, colleges, banks, medical centres and shopping complexes. The Apollo Hospitals and Enterprises is 2.1 km away from the area, while ESI Post Graduate Institute of Medical Science and Research is only 1.4 km away from the society.

The society is perfect for people working in Malleshwaram, Bovipalya and Basaveshwar Nagar, due to easy accessibility from these areas.

name: Zen Indraprastha by Pratham
desc:
We at PRATHAM embrace the alchemy of nature and our designs are crafted to be thoughtful, mindful and soulful which makes Zen Indraprastha a gateway to your Zenful Life.

At ZEN INDRAPRASTHA, we have harnessed the power of sunlight and wind, the two most powerful elements of nature and crafted homes with a soul. Sunlight possesses the power to exude positivity and refresh our minds, which is why our designers and architects have ensured that the design of the complex radiates the goodness of sunlight to bring in a sense of hope and happiness.

Welcome to a life that is filled with all things Zen.

name: Sattva Luxuria
desc: Sattva Luxuria epitomizes luxury in an unbeatable location – Malleshwaram, Bengaluru. Live a privileged life in this abode of automated luxury. Sattva Luxuria is a landmark residential project in the classy neighbourhood of 8th Main Malleshwaram, with easy access to the Metro station and just adjacent to the Orion Mall and The Sheraton. These fully air-conditioned homes stand out majestically with its iconic towers in fabulous glass finishes. This residential project comprises of 197 Ultra Luxurious Premium Apartments with premium lifestyle amenities. Spacious homes of 3BHK apartments and 4BHK duplex and penthouses in the range of 2215 sq. ft. to 4465 sq. ft., these homes are well planned, aesthetically laid out and stylishly finished. It has the latest automation to make life comfortable and easy. The homes have no shared walls and are open on three sides with complete privacy and plenty of natural light. Spread over 4 acres, the plush environment of Sattva Luxuria will raise your lifestyle by several notches. Amenities include a superbly equipped clubhouse, landscaped gardens, artificial waterfalls and swanky lobbies. Advanced technology, high security, complete power back up and green measures ensure the best quality living. Located in a central upmarket area, it is surrounded by high-end malls, luxury hotels and has quick connectivity through the elevated flyover to the International Airport, IT Parks, Corporate Offices and major localities of Bengaluru. The best hospitals and international schools are all close by. Sattva Luxuria by Sattva Group is a Landmark in the city! It’s a Milestone in your life!

With Meticulous Planning And Utmost Importance To State-Of-The-Art 24/7 Security, The Upcoming Birla Tisya Is Your Dream Home In Bangalore.

name: Cardinal One
desc:
An experience that stays true to it's promise. Precisely, what meets the eye!
It is an amalgam of Location, Community with Smart Living amenities. We believe to have Luxury Built-In, not Simulated - which is why every aspect of this project is as real as we have displayed, befitting our values of Excellency and Transparency!
Named after a magnificent bird that symbolizes hope, joy, health, rejuvenation and celebration - Cardinal One, strikes a perfect balance between city life and comfortable luxurious living, with the urbane Bengaluru ethos in mind - the need for space, speed and service Cardinal One project is developed by Cardinal Energy and Infrastructure Pvt Ltd (CIEPL) in joint venture with the Chigateri Family., CEIPL is a wholly owned subsidiary of Swan Energy Ltd., and the group comes with a history of more than a century, which is diversified mainly into sector like Textile, Clean Energy & Real Estate.
Swan Energy Limited (SEL), the parent company of (CIEPL) was originally incorporated in 1909 as Swan Mills Ltd. (SML), a manufacturer and marketer of cotton and polyester textile products in India. Today it is owned and managed by Dave and Merchant families who took over the Company from J.P Goenka Group in 1992. The company has since forayed into the booming real estate sector in 2004, closely followed by its entry into the green energy sector in 2008. Here it is set to tap the positive growth tailwind in the Indian energy sector with an innovative Re-gasification Project - LNG FSRU unit. Given the huge demand supply gap in the natural gas sector, the FSRU unit provides significant upside to the Company’s growth. Thus, the company has a pan-India presence. The Group has a fabric processing unit (Textile) in Ahmedabad. The Group has successfully developed 4 Real Estate (Residential & Commercial) project in Mumbai, Bangalore & Hyderabad. The Group is entered into Energy Sector developing India’s first FSRU based LNG import Terminal at Jafrabad Gujarat.
Swan Group of Companies for decades, have been striving to deliver excellence in textile, real estate and energy solutions. We now present to you our very first venture into the Bengaluru Residential Real Estate market – Cardinal One, a luxurious residence experience.
A promise of - you get what you see - a rare phenomenen in real estate! We hope to bring you a trust worthy experience to own a luxurious home in Bengaluru and Cardinal One is the first step towards that dream.

name: Puravankara Sunflower
desc:
About the Project - Puravankara Sunflower by Puravankara Limited
Welcome to Puravankara Sunflower, a prestigious residential project by Puravankara Limited. This project is located in Lakshminarayanapuram, Binnipete, Bangalore, offering you the perfect blend of luxury and comfort. The construction status of Puravankara Sunflower is Ready to Move, which means you can move in and start enjoying your new home right away. The project offers 2 BHK Apartments with a spacious area ranging from 1216 to 1222 sq.ft. There are a total of 228 units spread across 4 towers, providing you with ample options to choose from. Puravankara Sunflower is registered under RERA with the ID PRM/KA/RERA/1251/310/PR/171015/000403, giving you peace of mind and assurance of a reliable and trustworthy project. Home loans are available from HDFC and ICICI Bank, making it easier for you to finance your dream home.There are 228 units of 2 BHK Apartment for sale in Puravankara Sunflower, Lakshminarayanapuram, Binnipete, Bangalore, spread across 4 towers.

About the Builder - Puravankara Limited
Puravankara Limited is a renowned and trusted name in the real estate industry. With a rich experience of over 45 years, they have established themselves as one of the leading developers in India. Their commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction has earned them a strong reputation in the market. Since their establishment in 1975, Puravankara Limited has delivered numerous successful projects, each reflecting their dedication to excellence.

About the Locality - Lakshminarayanapuram, Binnipete, Bangalore
Lakshminarayanapuram, Binnipete in Bangalore is a bustling locality with excellent connectivity and a range of amenities. The project is surrounded by renowned schools like Sree Shwetha Public School, St Philomena's Middle Primary & Nursery School, and Christ School, ensuring that your children have access to quality education. For healthcare needs, there are hospitals like Abhinav Hospital, Sevabhai Hospital, and G.R. Hospital in close proximity. The locality also offers easy access to shopping malls like GT World Mall and ETA Namma Mall, where you can indulge in retail therapy.

Project Amenities
Puravankara Sunflower offers a host of amenities to enhance your lifestyle. These include a swimming pool, landscape garden, children's play area, gated community, and rainwater harvesting. The project also features a multi-purpose hall, sewage treatment plant, steam and sauna facilities, recreation facilities, a library, health facilities, a temple, supermarket, restaurants, and much more. With these amenities, you can enjoy a comfortable and convenient living experience.Puravankara Sunflower is designed with contemporary architecture and features to provide you with a perfect combination of style and functionality. The project is well-equipped with all the basic amenities to meet the needs of the residents.Don't miss the opportunity to own a home in Puravankara Sunflower and experience a luxurious and fulfilling lifestyle. Contact us now for more details and to book your dream home.

desc:
The newly launched Vruksha by Navami Builders is a beautiful residential property where urban life would meet the beauty of nature. Here you would find modern architectural apartments that are made according to the taste of the urban people and thus the design is quite sleek and modern. name: Renaissance Temple Bells
desc:
About the Project - Renaissance Temple Bells by Renaissance Holdings
Welcome to Renaissance Temple Bells by Renaissance Holdings, located in the vibrant neighborhood of Yesvantpur Industrial Suburb, Yeshwanthpur, Bangalore. This project is ready to move in, offering 2, 2.5, and 3 BHK apartments with a spacious area ranging from 1250 to 1800 sq.ft. With a total of 348 units, you have plenty of options to choose from.There are 348 units of 2, 2.5, 3 BHK Apartments for sale in Renaissance Temple Bells, Yesvantpur Industrial Suburb, Yeshwanthpur, Bangalore

About the Builder Section - Renaissance Holdings
Renaissance Holdings, established in 1994, is a renowned builder known for their commitment to quality and customer satisfaction. With years of experience in the real estate industry, they have successfully delivered numerous projects that have become landmarks in the city. Their attention to detail and innovative designs have earned them a reputation for excellence.

About the Locality - Yesvantpur Industrial Suburb, Yeshwanthpur, Bangalore
Yesvantpur Industrial Suburb, Yeshwanthpur, Bangalore is a prime location that offers a range of amenities and conveniences. You will find a number of reputed schools in the vicinity, such as BBMP Nursery Primary & High School, Mother Theresa Higher Primary School, and Shepherd Public School, ensuring that your children receive quality education. For higher education, there are colleges like ANUPAMA COLLEGE OF MANAGEMENT AND SCIENCE and Brindavan College of Engineering.When it comes to healthcare, you will be pleased to know that there are several hospitals nearby, including Manipal Hospital Yeshwanthpur, St. Theresa's Multi Speciality Hospital, and SHREYAS HOSPITAL. In terms of shopping, you have options like Orion Mall, China Bazaar, and Nakshatra, where you can indulge in some retail therapy.The locality is well-connected to the main highway, ensuring easy access to other parts of the city. Additionally, the presence of the metro station and Yelahanka railway junction within close proximity adds to the convenience of commuting.

Project Amenities
Renaissance Temple Bells offers a range of amenities to enhance your living experience. The project boasts a club house, sports facility, rainwater harvesting, intercom, 24x7 security, car parking, and 24 hours water supply. You can also enjoy the multipurpose hall, lawn tennis court, sun deck, and landscaped gardens. For fitness enthusiasts, there is a gymnasium, swimming pool, cycling and jogging track, and indoor games facility. The project is a gated community, ensuring the safety and security of its residents.In conclusion, Renaissance Temple Bells by Renaissance Holdings is a ready-to-move-in project that offers luxurious and spacious apartments in the prime locality of Yesvantpur Industrial Suburb, Yeshwanthpur, Bangalore. With its range of amenities and proximity to schools, hospitals, and shopping malls, it is the perfect choice for those seeking a comfortable and convenient lifestyle.

name: Peace Luxuria
desc:
Peace Luxuria in Basaveshwara Nagar, Bangalore West by A Peace Projects LLP is a residential project.

It is a new launch project.

About City:

The center of India's tech industry, Bangalore has a positive real estate market. The city is located in southern India on the Deccan Plateau and is the fifth most populous urban agglomeration in India. Presence of IT industries and a number of startups make it a forefront of the IT industry in India. The positivity in the real estate market can be attributed to the establishment of IT industries embarking new job opportunities in the city. This allows a number of professionals to move in the city creating a demand especially in the residential real estate market. 
Other factors attributing to this real estate scenario are presence of good infrastructure giving ease connectivity, education and healthcare facilities and the weather conditions.

Own a home in Raghav Apartment today!.

Banks such as HDFC, LIC Housing Finance, Punjab National Bank have approved financing for Raghav Apartment.

Basaveshwara Nagar is well-connected to other parts of city by road, which passes through the heart of this suburb. Prominent shopping malls, movie theatres, school, and hospitals are present in proximity of this residential project.

name: SP Residency
desc:
